PHRASE.LANG: A very large clock that hangs on the wall made from a Contender sports tire. Imagine the race car that came from. This is an active item. [#Legal]
Une très grande horloge à pendre au mur faite d'un pneu de sport Contender. Imaginez la voiture de course dont il provient. Il s'agit d'un objet actif interactif. [#Legal]
A very large clock that hangs on the wall made from a Contender sports tire. Imagine the race car that came from. This is an active item. [#Legal]
